trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Palmyra
There was one other sighting in Palmyra on or around August 1st 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMe my wife and nephew go out side every night before bed. Beginning in the middle of July we started noticing stars that would just take off at a high rate of speed and swap locations in the sky. Some would vanish and some would just move around in different directions. We see about 10 to 15 of these a night. It is august 20th now and we are still seeing them. We have no camera that is clear enough to veiw these objects let alone capture any. They seem to be getting more and more friendly and showing up everynight. Couple days back we saw a football sized craft fly right over our heads making little to no noise. It wasn't even flying fast enough to stay in the air but it did. We just want to know what these are and why they are picking my back yard to play with.
Summary: star like objects plus really large craft
